author: Special Correspondent
text:
The staff of the schools and wardens of the hostels run by the State Adidravida Welfare Department were directed to strictly adhere to the model code of conduct.

A meeting of the teachers of Adidravida schools and hostel wardens was held on Saturday and P. T. Sundaram, District Adidravida Welfare Officer, and Moorthy, District Backward Class Welfare Officer, spoke on the occasion.

They directed the participants to ensure that the walls of the schools and hostels were free from the political graffiti.
title: ‘Adhere to model code of conduct’
